Question ID 400 – Recycled waste

ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
Question asked
Can we assume that recycled waste can be calculated by subtracting non-recycled waste from
total waste?

ESRS E5 paragraph 37
Key terms
